# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vpwl.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpwl.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vpwl.csv ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpwl.csv ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vpwl_filebased.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpwl_filebased.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vpwl_repeat_step.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpwl_repeat_step.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vpwl_repeat_step.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpwl_repeat_step.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpwl_repeat_step.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vpwl_repeat_step.cir.tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpwl_repeat_step.cir.tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VPWL/vpwl.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> vpwl.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPWL/vpwl.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;vpwl;pwl;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VPWL/vpwl.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP vpwl.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VPWL/vpwl.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} vpwl.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VPWL/vpwl.cir.prn vpwl.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VPWL/vpwl.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED vpwl.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPWL/vpwl.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;vpwl;pwl;valgrind")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VPWL/vpwl_filebased.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> vpwl_filebased.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPWL/vpwl_filebased.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;vpwl;pwl;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VPWL/vpwl_filebased.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP vpwl_filebased.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VPWL/vpwl_filebased.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} vpwl_filebased.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VPWL/vpwl_filebased.cir.prn vpwl_filebased.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VPWL/vpwl_filebased.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED vpwl_filebased.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPWL/vpwl_filebased.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;vpwl;pwl;valgrind")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VPWL/vpwl_repeat_step.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} vpwl_repeat_step.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} vpwl_repeat_step.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VPWL/vpwl_repeat_step.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPWL/vpwl_repeat_step.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;vpwl;pwl;issue565;step;valgrind")
endif()
